description: Describes the customer feedback for a CodeGuru Reviewer recommendation.

parameters.name: CodeReviewArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CodeReview object.

parameters.name: RecommendationId
parameters.description: The recommendation ID that can be used to track the provided recommendations and then to collect the feedback.

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: Optional parameter to describe the feedback for a given user. If this is not supplied, it defaults to the user making the request. The UserId is an IAM principal that can be specified as an Amazon Web Services account ID or an Amazon Resource Name (ARN). For more information, see Specifying a Principal in the Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management User Guide.

nested_items.name: RecommendationFeedback
nested_items.description: The recommendation feedback given by the user.

nested_items.name: CodeReviewArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CodeReview object.

nested_items.name: RecommendationId
nested_items.description: The recommendation ID that can be used to track the provided recommendations. Later on it can be used to collect the feedback.

nested_items.name: Reactions
nested_items.description: List for storing reactions. Reactions are utf-8 text code for emojis. You can send an empty list to clear off all your feedback.

nested_items.name: UserId
nested_items.description: The ID of the user that made the API call.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimeStamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the feedback was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTimeStamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the feedback was last updated.
